title: Exclusive: Andy Grammer’s Final Tour Diary
content:
Artist on the rise Andy Grammer has hits that inspire...      
It was an amazing tour, but all good things have to come to an end! 
 
Andy Grammer has wrapped up his latest tour, and has been one busy man. We’ll let him explain it to you in his own words in his last tour diary entry for Celebuzz: 
 
This week consisted of very little sleep. I dropped my new single “Good To Be Alive,” performed it on Jimmy Kimmel and toured through Kansas City, Idaho and Minnesota. Amidst all that, I announced that I’m going to be on Dancing with the Stars (and I met and rehearsed with my incredibly talented dance partner, Allison Holker ). It feels like life is moving at hyper speed right now, but who needs sleep? ITS GOOD TO BE ALIVE. 
 
As for his chances on Dancing with the Stars , Grammer told Billboard magazine , “I am definitely an underdog on this show. There is no doubt about it. I don’t know how to dance and I don’t have any extra flexible skills. There is going to be a lot of molding. I still think I got a shot.” 
 
He needs your votes everyone! So make sure to tune in and get your dialing digits ready!
